::Hot Rod/Epyon::

Hot Rod turned to Khonkolor.
"Dont you mean 'all for one, and one for all'?"

Epyon jumped from the shots.
"It figures he would come after me first."
From Rpyon's shield extends a heavy metal link whip. It also glows with
energy. He whips it at Nightstrike, trying to slash his chest.
